title: Nigerian delegation arrives in Islamabad for OIC special moot on Afghanistan
content:
ISLAMABAD, Dec 19 (APP):A delegation from Nigeria arrived here on late Saturday evening to attend the 17th extraordinary session of the Council of Foreign Ministers of Organization of Islamic Cooperation (OIC), being held in the capital on December 19.
The delegation was led by Permanent representative to OIC of Nigeria Ambassador Yahya Lawal.
Nigerian ambassador to Pakistan and senior officials from the Ministry of Foreign Affairs received the guests, as the host country rolled out a red carpet in honour of the dignitaries.
